channel.title: DNS on The NullCereal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DNS on The NullCereal Blog

item.title: Going Phishing for CopyCats
item.description: If you’re in charge of a domain that others visit on a regular basis, you want to ensure that users continue to trust that domain, after all, your domain is an extension of your brand, which is your business. So you want to keep phishers and attackers from creating fakes and copies of it to lure your customers away or tarnish your brand with false information.
